definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
limit up, limit down/limit on daily price variation

sentences.english: A limitation of the analysis was that population-specific effects were not considered.
sentences.chinese: 这项分析的限制是并未考虑到族群特定的效应。

sentences.english: Event throughput is bound by the server speed.
sentences.chinese: 事件吞吐量受服务器的速度限制。

sentences.english: The languages were severely suppressed in education by the Japanese government.
sentences.chinese: 日本政府严格限制了琉球语在学校的教学和使用。

sentences.english: The utility model has the characteristics of light and handy volume, convenient operation and no restriction of making materials.
sentences.chinese: 具有体积轻巧，使用方便，制作材料不受限制的特点。

sentences.english: This method is much more efficient than the bubble sort, though it has more constraints.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法更有效比冒泡排序，但有更多的限制。

sentences.english: Smooth downshifts are enhanced by a standard, back-torque limiting clutch.
sentences.chinese: 光滑平顺而得到加强，一个标准，回扭矩限制离合器。

sentences.english: This, of course, is the bare minimum and restricts only administrative access.
sentences.chinese: 这当然是最小设置，仅仅限制管理访问权限。

sentences.english: We also intend to remove any special naming restriction.
sentences.chinese: 我们还希望删除任何特殊的命名限制。

sentences.english: We can refund the full fare ticket for you.
sentences.chinese: 您的客票限制在原出票地点退票。

sentences.english: In the hexagonal close packed structure, slip systems are more limited .
sentences.chinese: 在六方密排晶格中，滑移系受到较多的限制。

sentences.english: Tag ! ine restrict swinging of ! oad.
sentences.chinese: 可限制负荷摆动弧度的牵线。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, the enterprise-oriented social partnership is held back by various factors.
sentences.chinese: 其实，以企业为主导的社会伙伴关系面对种种的限制。

sentences.english: Also, try to limit your intake of caffeine and alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 你也要限制你的咖啡因和酒精的摄入量。

sentences.english: Thus, in the ordinary course of warehousing, the temptations to embezzle are strictly limited.
sentences.chinese: 所以在普通仓库的运作中，侵占的诱惑被严格限制了。

sentences.english: In fact, the mankind have been aring set up a network of break the space and time restriction.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，人类一直在构建突破空间与时间限制的网络。

sentences.english: Can say, confiscate what bring about pair of citizen money property right directly is privative with limitation.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，没收直接导致对公民财产权的剥夺和限制。

definition: to limit/to confine/to restrict sth within set boundaries
to exceed/to overstep/to go too far/to encroach
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
